definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: So that leaves each carbon with only one hybrid orbital left.
sentences.chinese: 這樣每個碳原子只剩下一個雜化軌道。

sentences.english: Alkenes have one or more double bonds between carbon atoms, where two pairs of electrons are shared.
sentences.chinese: 鏈烯有一個或多個共價鍵，即碳原子分享兩對電子。

sentences.english: The nanotubes are elongated, hollow cylinders of carbon atoms.
sentences.chinese: 納米管是由碳原子拉長的空心圓筒。

sentences.english: In fused-ring and bridge-ring compounds two carbons are common to the two rings .
sentences.chinese: 在稠環和橋環化合物中，兩個碳原子是兩個環公用的。

sentences.english: Such a carbon is designated as a chiral carbon.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的碳原子稱爲手性碳。

sentences.english: PROFESSOR: All right, start again, what's the hybridization of the carbon atom?
sentences.chinese: 好了，再說一遍，碳原子的雜化軌道是什麼？

sentences.english: sp3 PROFESSOR: OK, so it's 2 s p 3, and our second carbon is also 2 s p 3.
sentences.chinese: 好的，是，第二個碳原子也是2sp3。

sentences.english: This would involve slipping a few radioactive carbon atoms into molecules of the drugs in question.
sentences.chinese: 這涉及到將很多放射性碳原子放入藥物分子中的問題。

sentences.english: So let's take a look at this with carbon.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們看一下這個碳原子。

sentences.english: The meso carbon atom of the methine linkage of the dye is attached to the nitrogen atom of an amino group .
sentences.chinese: 該染料的甲川鏈上的中位碳原子與氨基的氮原子相連。

sentences.english: Because of the valence state specificity, there are many allotropes of the carbon.
sentences.chinese: 碳原子由於價態的特殊性，有着衆多的同素異形體。

sentences.english: Previously, two-dimensional carbon sheets weren't thought to be stable.
sentences.chinese: 在此之前，2維碳原子片一直被認爲是不穩定的。

sentences.english: The carbon atoms in the plastic are saturated, having bonded with two hydrogen atoms.
sentences.chinese: 塑料中的碳原子呈飽和態，與兩個氫原子相結合。

sentences.english: There are several examples of a one-carbon degradation leading to aldehydes.
sentences.chinese: 有一些減少一個碳原子製備醛的實例。

sentences.english: The size of the carbon atom is based on its van der Waals radius.
sentences.chinese: 碳原子的大小以其範德華半徑爲基礎。

sentences.english: The hydrogen atoms get kicked out, and carbon atoms form bonds with other carbon atoms.
sentences.chinese: 氫原子被踢出來，碳原子之間相互結合。
